entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
